SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parking_pay a LEFT JOIN parking_space b ON a.parking_space_id = b.parking_space_id LEFT JOIN USER c ON a.charge_worker_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN house d ON b.house_id = d.house_id
AND CONCAT_WS(',',estate_pay_num,house_num,owner_name,area,estate_unit_price,pay_month_type_id,payment_amount,a.operator,a.operate_time,account) LIKE '%${at_search}%'

SELECT b.car_owner_name,b.license_plate_number,b.previous_parking_unit_price,b.parking_num,c.owner_name,b.parking_space_id FROM parking_pay a LEFT JOIN parking_space b ON a.parking_space_id = b.parking_space_id LEFT JOIN house c ON b.house_id = c.house_id WHERE c.house_num = #{house_num} AND c.community_id = #{community_id}

SELECT MAX(service_end_date) AS maxInsert FROM parking_pay a LEFT JOIN parking_space b ON a.parking_space_id = b.parking_space_id LEFT JOIN house c ON b.community_id = c.community_id WHERE c.house_num = #{house_num} AND b.community_id = #{community_id}
